Detailed Description

static LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.thinning.HilditchSkeletonization.findSkeleton ( LatLonGrid  input,
int  thresh,
File  out 
) throws Exception [static] 

00040                                                                                                    {
00041         // threshold.  object=1 and background=0
00042         LatLonGrid binaryImage = new SimpleThresholder(thresh).threshold(input);
00043         if (out != null){
00044             KmlWriter.write(binaryImage, out, "thresh", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00045         }
00046         
00047         final int nx = binaryImage.getNumLat();
00048         final int ny = binaryImage.getNumLon();
00049         int numChanges;
00050         do {
00051             // compute ap, bp
00052             LatLonGrid ap = new LatLonGrid(nx,ny,-1,binaryImage.getNwCorner(),binaryImage.getLatRes(),binaryImage.getLonRes());
00053             LatLonGrid bp = new LatLonGrid(nx,ny,-1,binaryImage.getNwCorner(),binaryImage.getLatRes(),binaryImage.getLonRes());
00054             for (int i=1; i < (nx-1); ++i) for (int j=1; j < (ny-1); ++j){
00055                 if ( binaryImage.getValue(i, j) > 0){
00056                     // find A(p) and B(p)
00057                     State state = new State( binaryImage.getValue(i-1,j-1) );
00058                     state.update( binaryImage.getValue(i-1, j) );
00059                     state.update( binaryImage.getValue(i-1, j+1) );
00060                     state.update( binaryImage.getValue(i, j+1) );
00061                     state.update( binaryImage.getValue(i+1, j+1) );
00062                     state.update( binaryImage.getValue(i+1, j) );
00063                     state.update( binaryImage.getValue(i+1, j-1) );
00064                     state.update( binaryImage.getValue(i, j-1) );
00065                     state.update( binaryImage.getValue(i-1, j-1) );
00066                     ap.setValue(i,j, state.ap);
00067                     bp.setValue(i,j, state.bp);
00068                 }
00069             }
00070             
00071             // peel off pixel?
00072             numChanges = 0;
00073             LatLonGrid after = LatLonGrid.copyOf(binaryImage);
00074             for (int i=1; i < (nx-1); ++i) for (int j=1; j < (ny-1); ++j){
00075                 if ( ap.getValue(i,j) == 1 && bp.getValue(i,j) >= 2 && bp.getValue(i,j) <= 6){
00076                     if ( ap.getValue(i-1,j) == 0 ||
00077                             binaryImage.getValue(i-1,j) == 0 ||
00078                             binaryImage.getValue(i,j+1) == 0 ||
00079                             binaryImage.getValue(i,j-1) == 0 ){
00080                         if ( ap.getValue(i,j+1) == 0 ||
00081                                 binaryImage.getValue(i-1,j) == 0 ||
00082                                 binaryImage.getValue(i,j+1) == 0 ||
00083                                 binaryImage.getValue(i+1,j) == 0){
00084                             // peel
00085                             after.setValue(i,j, 0);
00086                             ++numChanges;
00087                         }
00088                     }
00089                 }
00090             }
00091             binaryImage = after;
00092             System.out.println(numChanges + " pixels peeled off in iteration");
00093         } while (numChanges > 0);
00094 
00095         return binaryImage;
00096     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.thinning.HilditchSkeletonization.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00098                                                             {
00099         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("hilditchskeleton");
00100         LatLonGrid popdensity = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA, new GlobalPopulation.LogScaling()).crop(900, 2500, 200, 200);
00101         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "orig", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00102 
00103         popdensity = new DilateErodeFilter(2,3).filter(popdensity);
00104         popdensity = new ErodeDilateFilter(2,3).filter(popdensity);
00105         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "filledin", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00106         
00107         LatLonGrid result = findSkeleton(popdensity, 300, out);
00108         result.setMissing(0); // to make the 1s pop out
00109         KmlWriter.write(result, out, "skel", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00110     }
